scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:ManageFragments_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($uploadContextId = $core_v2_uploadedFile.CreateContextId()) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('templates.vm') $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('style.vm') #if ($context.RunTests) #set ($developerMode = $context.DeveloperModeEnabled)

  • #if ($developerMode) Developer Mode #else Non-Developer Mode #end Integration test results will be written to the console.

    The Content Fragment Test Support plugin should be enabled prior.

  • Run Tests
#end
$core_v2_language.GetResource('Welcome')
